sent.orig: Day. Play. We play all day.
Another man, a driving instructor, felt it was unsafe to work, Day said.
sent.trans: 另外一个男性，一位驾驶教员，感到去工作的是非常不安全的，Day说。

sent.orig: When we talk about the number of days we are using DAY to mean 24 hours.
sent.trans: 当我们谈到天数时，所指“Day”的意思是24个小时。

sent.orig: D is the initial letter of the word day.
D-day beaches and WWII tours mix with medieval art.
sent.trans: D-day沙滩和二战塔混合成了中世纪的艺术风格。
